channel.title: How do you
channel.description:
How do you change what the menu's say like i want ::commandhelp to say all the commands i made and stuff.
can someone help me :confused:

item.title: How do you
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

ill help, btw nice server bl33dscape =)
see this is my help menu [you can make the commands, ill show after]
btw dnt copy it, i copied sum ova stuff

if(playerRights == 0) { sendQuest("@dre@Welcome Menu and Help Menu", 8144); //Regular player title } if(playerRights == 1) { sendQuest("@dre@Moderator Help Menu", 8144); //Moderator Title } if(playerRights == 2) { sendQuest("@dre@Administrator Menu", 8144); //Administrator Title } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Elvemage") && playerRights >= 2) { // Owner Title sendQuest("@dre@Owner's Help Menu", 8144); } clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to @red@O@gre@w@whi@n@red@a@gre@g@whi@e @red@P@gre@K", 8145); sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8147); sendQuest("@dre@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8148); sendQuest("@blu@===Your PK Stats===", 8149); sendQuest("@red@Total Kills - "+killcount, 8150); sendQuest("@red@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 8151); sendQuest("@red@Death Count - "+deathcount, 8152); sendQuest("@dbl@Regular Player Commands", 8154); sendQuest("@blu@::help @red@ Shows this help menu", 8155); sendQuest("@blu@::info @red@ Shows @red@O@gre@w@whi@n@red@a@gre@g@whi@e @red@P@gre@K@red@ server information", 8156); sendQuest("@blu@::rules @red@ Shows the @red@O@gre@w@whi@n@red@a@gre@g@whi@e @red@P@gre@K@red@ rules", 8157); sendQuest("@blu@::starter @red@ Gives you a once off starter pack", 8158); sendQuest("@blu@::maxprayer @red@ Gives you 99 prayer", 8159); sendQuest("@blu@::food @red@ Gives you an invent of food", 8160); sendQuest("@blu@::charge @red@ Charge spell - only works with 80+ magic", 8161); sendQuest("@blu@::players @red@ Tells you how many people are on and shows who", 8162); sendQuest("@blu@::empty @red@ Gets rid of ALL items in your inventory", 8163); sendQuest("@blu@::pass newpass @red@ Changes your account's password", 8164); sendQuest("@blu@::yell @red@ Sends a message to all logged in players", 8165); sendQuest("@blu@::char @red@ Brings up the screen to change your appearance", 8166); sendQuest("@blu@::range @red@ Takes you to the range training spot", 8167); sendQuest("@blu@::mystats @red@ Shows you your account information", 8168); if(!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Elvemage") && playerRights == 0) { sendQuest("@dbl@For more help, ask one of our friendly Admins or Mods", 8170); } if(playerRights == 1) { sendQuest
theres my help menu base, heres my command for help.

[code] }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“help”)) {
MainHelpMenu();
} [/code]

hope it helps you.

Read full topic
